FuncDef: This command associates a subscriber identification policy to this SAP. The subscriber identification policy must be defined prior to associating the profile with a SAP in theconfig>subscr-mgmt>sub-ident-policycontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a subscriber identification policy for this SAP. The subscriber profile must be defined prior to associating the profile with a SAP in the config>subscr-mgmt>sub-ident-policy context.
